Name: Excessive Use of Hard-Coded Literals in Initialization
Description:
The software initializes a data element using a hard-coded
					literal that is not a simple integer or static constant element.
ExtendedDescription: This issue makes it more difficult to modify or maintain the software, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities.  It also might make it easier to introduce vulnerabilities.
